text: Centralism is an idea on how to organize a state or government. The idea is to focus this organization under a single government instead of using many local government bodies. In many cases, this makes communication easier. An organization that is an example for centralism is the Roman Catholic Church. ==Related pages== * Devolution, the opposite concept * Democratic centralism, a concept of Vladimir Lenin; he used the idea of centralism to organize political parties.
